item.description:
A new member suggested meeting at Espress Yourself Coffee, at the intersection of Richmond and Pleasant streets. I haven't scheduled a meetup since August, so let's do it. How does Wednesday, October 21 at 7:00 PM sound to everyone? If you like, bring a book to talk about.

I apologize for not scheduling a meetup in September. I was away for half of the month and it slipped my mind.
item.name: October meeting at Espress Yourself
